detectors.description:
BasicBeowulf.updateAdmin(address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Beowulf.sol#262-266) should emit an event for:

		- admin = _admin (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Beowulf.sol#265)

Reentrancy in BasicBeowulf.transfer(address,uint256,bytes) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Beowulf.sol#171-189):
	External calls:
	- receiver.tokenFallback(msg.sender,_value,_data) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Beowulf.sol#184)
	Event emitted after the call(s):
	- Transfer(msg.sender,_to,_value,_data) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Beowulf.sol#185)

detectors.description:

	- ERC20.totalSupply() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Beowulf.sol#39)

	- ERC20.transfer(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Beowulf.sol#45)
